verbs.description: Former Milwaukee Sheriff David Clarke [V: was] mocked on Twitter after he suggested that President Donald Trump invite Triple Crown winner Justify to the White House .
[ARG1: Former Milwaukee Sheriff David Clarke] was [V: mocked] [ARGM-LOC: on Twitter] [ARGM-TMP: after he suggested that President Donald Trump invite Triple Crown winner Justify to the White House] .
Former Milwaukee Sheriff David Clarke was mocked on Twitter after [ARG0: he] [V: suggested] [ARG1: that President Donald Trump invite Triple Crown winner Justify to the White House] .
